get.description: Use the WebSocket protocol to connect to this endpoint `ws://localhost:5410/ws/votes`. After a successful connection (`101 Switching Protocols`), the server will send periodic data in a format like `VoteUpdate` (see schema below). This endpoint will return candidate id and total votes in real time everytime user vote to a candidate
get.summary: Get total votes in real time
